description.value:
These wicked-looking spiked metal wheels fit around the ankles and jingle when the wearer walks, imposing a -1 item penalty on Stealth checks. If used as a weapon, they are treated as a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Spiked Gauntlet]{Spiked Gauntlet}.

Activate A Interact

Frequency once per 10 minutes

Requirements You are riding a mount

Effect You kick both spurs into your mount's flank. Your mount takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d6.success] and gains the quickened condition for 1 minute or until the persistent bleed damage ends, whichever comes first. It can use the extra action only to Stride.

source.value: Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands
